message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with hand pose tracking/estimation using computer vision techniques, specifically stereo matching. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves robotics applications, which suggests the possibility of it being categorized under cs.RO (Robotics). The use of machine learning algorithms for hand pose tracking/estimation also makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely category. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel stereo-based hand segmentation algorithm, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper involves 3D tracking and estimation, which could potentially be categorized under cs.GR (Graphics).
